item.title: Obj attk monsters
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Youâ€™ll need to:

  1. Make setting up the cannon set X and Y variables for the player.
  2. Animate the cannon when fire is selected, as well as set some sort of boolean type value to true for the cannon and set player attacking to true.
  3. Edit the attacking method for if the player is using the cannon, launch the projectiles from the X and Y values saved to the player earlier, and add the damaging based on (int)Math.round(Math.random() * 30).
